name: Swenggco Software
description: We are Swenggco Software, an app development company located in Sialkot, Pakistan. We are a team of high-qualified developers with allegiance for mobility, talent for app engineering, and knowledge for vectoring your ideas in the right direction so they can reach the hands of users. We help our reputable clients plan, design, develop, and support mobile products like apps, games, back-ends, websites, and enterprise solutions.
